languages.text: {n}Что-то в вашем голосе заставляет улыбку Немезита поблекнуть, а пистолет дрогнуть... но лишь на мгновение.{/n} "Вижу, ты присвоил{mf||а} их так крепко, что пользуешься их именем и памятью даже после смерти".

{n}Something in your voice causes Nemesite's sneer to fade and his gun to shake... but only for a moment.{/n} "I see you have appropriated their names and memories as well. How fitting, to use people even in death."
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то в вашем голосе заставляет улыбку Немезита поблекнуть, а пистолет дрогнуть... но лишь на мгновение.{/n} "Вижу, ты присвоил{mf||а} их так крепко, что пользуешься их именем и памятью даже после смерти".

traits.locale_text: {n}Something in your voice makes Nemesite's smile fade and the gun shake... but only for a moment.{/n} "I see you have appropriated their names and memory too. How fitting, to use people even in death."

{n}Something in your voice makes Nemesite's smile fade and the gun shake... but only for a moment.{/n} "I see you have appropriated their names and memory too. How fitting, to use people even in death."

{n}Something in your voice causes Nemesite's smile to fade and his gun to shake... but only for a moment.{/n} "I see you have appropriated their names and memories as well. How fitting, to use people even in death."

{n}Something in your voice causes Nemesite's smile to fade and his gun to shake... but only for a moment.{/n} "I see you have appropriated their names and memories as well. How fitting, to use people even in death."

{n}Something in your voice causes Nemesite's sneer to fade and his gun to shake... but only for a moment.{/n} "I see you have appropriated their names and memories as well. How fitting, to use people even in death."

{n}Something in your voice causes Nemesite's sneer to fade and his gun to shake... but only for a moment.{/n} "I see you have appropriated their names and memories as well. How fitting, to use people even in death."

languages.text: {n}Etwas in deiner Stimme lässt Nemesits Hohn verschwinden und seine Waffe zittern ... aber nur für einen Moment.{/n} "Ihr habt Euch also ihre Namen und Erinnerungen ebenfalls zu eigen gemacht. Ihr benutzt Leute selbst im Tod – das passt."
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice causes Nemesite's sneer to fade and his gun to shake... but only for a moment.{/n} "I see you have appropriated their names and memories as well. How fitting, to use people even in death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Etwas in deiner Stimme lässt Nemesits Hohn verschwinden und seine Waffe zittern ... aber nur für einen Moment.{/n} "Ihr habt Euch also ihre Namen und Erinnerungen ebenfalls zu eigen gemacht. Ihr benutzt Leute selbst im Tod – das passt."

languages.text: {n}Algo en tu voz borra la sonrisa arrogante de Nemesitio y hace temblar su arma... pero solo por un momento.{/n} «Veo que también te has apropiado de sus nombres y recuerdos. No esperaba menos: usas incluso a los muertos».
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice causes Nemesite's sneer to fade and his gun to shake... but only for a moment.{/n} "I see you have appropriated their names and memories as well. How fitting, to use people even in death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo en tu voz borra la sonrisa arrogante de Nemesitio y hace temblar su arma... pero solo por un momento.{/n} «Veo que también te has apropiado de sus nombres y recuerdos. No esperaba menos: usas incluso a los muertos».

languages.text: {n}こちらの言葉のどこかにピクリときて、ネメサイトは嘲笑を消し、その手の銃が震える…しかし、それもほんの一瞬だった。{/n}「彼らの名前と記憶にも手を出したか。死してなお人を利用するとは、なんとあなたらしい」
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice causes Nemesite's sneer to fade and his gun to shake... but only for a moment.{/n} "I see you have appropriated their names and memories as well. How fitting, to use people even in death."

traits.locale_text: {n}こちらの言葉のどこかにピクリときて、ネメサイトは嘲笑を消し、その手の銃が震える…しかし、それもほんの一瞬だった。{/n}「彼らの名前と記憶にも手を出したか。死してなお人を利用するとは、なんとあなたらしい」

languages.text: {n}听到你的声音之后，涅墨斯特脸上的冷笑消失了，手里的枪也颤抖起来……但瞬间就恢复了原样。{/n}“看得出来，你盗用了他们的名字，他们的记忆。他们已经死了，你居然还在利用他们，可真有你的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice causes Nemesite's sneer to fade and his gun to shake... but only for a moment.{/n} "I see you have appropriated their names and memories as well. How fitting, to use people even in death."

traits.locale_text: {n}听到你的声音之后，涅墨斯特脸上的冷笑消失了，手里的枪也颤抖起来……但瞬间就恢复了原样。{/n}“看得出来，你盗用了他们的名字，他们的记忆。他们已经死了，你居然还在利用他们，可真有你的。”

languages.text: {n}Quelque chose dans votre voix efface le rictus de Némésite et son pistolet commence à trembler... pour un instant seulement.{/n} « Je vois que vous vous êtes aussi {mf|approprié|appropriée} leurs noms et leurs souvenirs. Utiliser autrui, même dans la mort, voilà qui ne me surprend guère. »
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice causes Nemesite's sneer to fade and his gun to shake... but only for a moment.{/n} "I see you have appropriated their names and memories as well. How fitting, to use people even in death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Quelque chose dans votre voix efface le rictus de Némésite et son pistolet commence à trembler... pour un instant seulement.{/n} « Je vois que vous vous êtes aussi {mf|approprié|appropriée} leurs noms et leurs souvenirs. Utiliser autrui, même dans la mort, voilà qui ne me surprend guère. »

languages.text: {n}Ses tonundaki bir şey, Nemezit'in alaycılığının azalmasına ve silahının titremesine yol açıyor... Ancak uzun sürmüyor.{/n} "Bakıyorum da hem isimlerini hem de hatıralarını sahiplenmişsin. Ölürken bile insanları kullanmak, ne kadar da sana yaraşan bir şey."
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice causes Nemesite's sneer to fade and his gun to shake... but only for a moment.{/n} "I see you have appropriated their names and memories as well. How fitting, to use people even in death."
